name: py-pyts

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
pyts is a Python package for time series classification. It aims to make
time series classification easily accessible by providing preprocessing
and utility tools, and implementations of state-of-the-art algorithms.
Most of these algorithms transform time series, thus pyts provides
several tools to perform these transformations.

dependencies.name: py-numba
dependencies.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-sdmetrics
dependent_to.description:
The SDMetrics library provides a set of dataset-agnostic tools for
evaluating the quality of a synthetic database by comparing it to the
real database that it is modeled after.
